gulp < 0.inp > 0.out; gulp < 1.inp > 1.out; gulp < 2.inp > 2.out; gulp < 3.inp > 3.out; gulp < 4.inp > 4.out; gulp < 5.inp > 5.out; gulp < 6.inp > 6.out; gulp < 7.inp > 7.out; gulp < 8.inp > 8.out; gulp < 9.inp > 9.out; gulp < 10.inp > 10.out; gulp < 11.inp > 11.out; gulp < 12.inp > 12.out; gulp < 13.inp > 13.out; gulp < 14.inp > 14.out; gulp < 15.inp > 15.out; gulp < 16.inp > 16.out; gulp < 17.inp > 17.out; gulp < 18.inp > 18.out; gulp < 19.inp > 19.out; gulp < 20.inp > 20.out;
